names.english: compound pheretima and polygonum cuspidatum decoction
names.commonEnglish: Compound Pheretima (Pheretima) and Polygonum Cuspidatum Decoction

actions: Tonifies Qi and Blood, strengthens the Spleen, tonifies the Lungs, promotes urination and reduces edema.
Clears Heat, unblocks and promotes movement in the channels and collaterals and promotes urination.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis, clears Heat, resolves Dampness, disperses swelling, drains Heat and transforms Phlegm.
Reduces Food Stagnation, transforms accumulation, promotes digestion, eliminates distention, descends Qi,reduces Phlegm and treats hypertension.
Invigorates the Blood, dispels Blood Stasis and reduces swelling.
Promotes urination and unblocks blood vessels.
Promotes urination, clears Damp-Heat, clears Liver Heat, clears the Lungs and expels Phlegm.
Tonifies the Spleen and augments Qi and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.

syndromes: Qi Deficiency with Damp-Heat and Blood Stagnation

symptoms: Urinary frequency, pain and burning sensation in urination
White mucous discharge from the urinary tract after bowel movement
